title: Caramel Creme Killer
description: If you loved the Frosted Love series, you’ll love its next chapter… The INNcredibly Sweet series.  The sleepy seaside town of Calgon, Florida is rocked when a pillar of the community is murdered. Much to the astonishment of Chas, Missy and the gang, the suspects are many and the clues are far too few in this suspenseful tale of mystery and intrigue.
author: Summer  Prescott
